appSpecContent.content:
version: 0.0
Resources:
  - TargetService:
      Type: AWS::ECS::Service
      Properties:
        TaskDefinition: "arn:aws:ecs:us-east-1:811738710312:task-definition/strapi-task:225"
        LoadBalancerInfo:
          ContainerName: "strapi-app"
          ContainerPort: 1337
        NetworkConfiguration:
          AwsvpcConfiguration:
            Subnets: ["subnet-0e7cd1875b0aec352", "subnet-0b2e67b96310fbd8c"]
            SecurityGroups: ["sg-06ca30c948083f1d7"]
            AssignPublicIp: "ENABLED"
